text: As the WSJ notes, Gupta as a journalist is already a public figure who informs the nation about health. Since CNN learned of Gupta's candidacy, the cable network has made sure his on-air reporting has n't touched health-care policy or other subjects involving the new administration, the WSJ reports.
title: So in choosing Gupta, the TV star and neurosurgeon, President-elect Barack Obama seems to be reaching back to the era when C. Everett Koop was the straight-talking surgeon general advocating for the public's health.
